Class Camera

  • java.lang.Object
    • Camera

  • public class Camera
extends java.lang.Object
    Denver Quane ID#101611184 CS-351 last Rev. 2/15/17 This class is responsible for the Camera that defines what the user/program currently sees of the Game Board, as defined in Grid.java

        Sets the size, in cells, of how large the board that the camera traverses is
        Parameters:
        rows - How many rows the board has
        cols - How many columns the board has

        col - column coordinate

      • zoomAdjustAtCellCoords

        public void zoomAdjustAtCellCoords(int change,
                                   int zoomCol,
                                   int zoomRow)
        Specifies the location that the Camera should place at the center of the new zoom level
        Parameters:
        change - Change in zoom (positive or negative)
        zoomCol - Column location for the new zoom
        zoomRow - Row location for the new zoom

      • moveByDrag

        Specifies the change of camera location by how much it was moved in the x and y dimensions
        Parameters:
        x - displacement by dragging in the x dimension
        y - displacement by dragging in the y dimension
